This area is for lab members only.

If you are interested in our work, join us by clicking [here]().

#### Welcome new members!

We are excited to have you join the Quantitative Histories Workshop! 

This section contains links to the required on-boarding documents that you will need to complete for our lab. 

When completing documents with sensitive information, please do not upload or email personal details (such as your SSN). Instead, you should stop by a Faculty Director's office hours to finalize any forms. 

For your first task, please complete the following steps below:

| <u>Step 1: Contact information </u>

- To complete the *Quantitative Histories Workshop Information Form*, please click [here]().

| <u>Step 2: Paperwork </u>

- Morehouse College lab members, please click [here]().

- Howard University lab members, please click [here]().

- External partners, consultants, and others, please click [here]().

| <u>Step 3: Say cheese! </u>

- Please upload your bio and a high-resolution photo [here]().

| <u>Step 4: Project on-boarding </u>

- Members must complete on-boarding for their project group; please see your group leader. 

| <u>Step 5: Readings</u>

- New members should get started by exploring the following books and papers:
  
  * *We Do This 'Til We Free Us* by Mariame Kaba.
  
If you are unsure of who to contact, please email the lab manager or Dr. Alexander.
